title: Tilbury Town
text:
Tilbury Town is a <a href="fictional">fictional</a> American town which serves as the location for many works by the <a href="United%20States">American</a> poet <a href="Edwin%20Arlington%20Robinson">Edwin Arlington Robinson</a>.
The small <a href="New%20England">New England</a> village was modeled after <a href="Gardiner%2C%20Maine">Gardiner, Maine</a> where Robinson grew up.
